info.description: This is an API for a Online Webbased Auction System
info.title: Online Webbased Auction System API

delete.description: Allows an admin to delete any auction.

parameters.description: ID of the auction to delete
parameters.name: auctionID

500.description: Internal Server Error - failed to delete auction
Internal Server Error - failed to retrieve users

get.description: Fetches a list of all auctions with admin privileges.

500.description: Internal Server Error - failed to retrieve auctions

parameters.description: Auction payload
parameters.name: payload

500.description: Internal Server Error - failed to create auction

post.description: Allows a user to upload an image to the server.

parameters.description: the image to upload
parameters.name: image

500.description: Internal Server Error - failed to process file upload

get.description: Retrieves an auction by its ID.

parameters.description: ID of the auction to retrieve
parameters.name: auctionID

500.description: Internal Server Error - failed to retrieve auction

put.description: Allows a seller to update an auction they have created.

parameters.description: ID of the auction to update
parameters.name: auctionID

parameters.description: Auction update payload
parameters.name: payload

500.description: Internal Server Error - failed to update auction

delete.description: Allows a seller to delete an auction they have created.

parameters.description: ID of the auction to delete
parameters.name: auctionID

500.description: Internal Server Error - failed to delete auction

post.description: Allows a user to place a bid on an existing auction.

parameters.description: ID of the auction to bid on
parameters.name: auctionID

parameters.description: Bid request payload
parameters.name: payload

401.description: Unauthorized - user not authenticated or authorized

500.description: Internal Server Error - failed to place bid

post.description: Allows the seller of an auction to close the auction. The auction must be open.

parameters.description: ID of the auction to close
parameters.name: auctionID

401.description: Unauthorized - user not authenticated or not the seller

500.description: Internal Server Error - failed to close auction

post.description: Create a Stripe Checkout Session for an auction, using the current price of the auction and the authenticated user's ID.
post.summary: Create Stripe Checkout Session for an auction

parameters.description: ID of the auction to create a checkout session for
parameters.name: auction_id

500.description: Internal Server Error - failed to create Stripe Checkout Session

post.description: Send a message to the support team

parameters.description: Contact Support payload
parameters.name: payload

500.description: Internal Server Error - failed to contact support

get.description: Returns the status of the application

post.description:
Authenticates a user using email and password.
Upon successful authentication, a short-lived **JWT (access token)** is set as an `HttpOnly` cookie named `jwt`.
A long-lived **refresh token** is also set as an `HttpOnly` cookie named `refresh_token`.
Both cookies are crucial for maintaining user session and subsequent authenticated requests.

parameters.description: Login credentials
parameters.name: payload

200.description: Two HttpOnly cookies are set: 'jwt' (access token) and 'refresh_token' (refresh token).

post.description: Clears the user's authentication cookies, effectively logging them out.

Refreshes the JWT access token using a valid refresh token.
If the refresh token is valid, a new JWT is generated and set as an `HttpOnly` cookie.
A valid refresh token must be provided as an `HttpOnly` cookie named `refresh_token`.

401.description: Unauthorized - Refresh token not found or invalid

500.description: Internal Server Error - Failed to generate new token

parameters.description: User payload
parameters.name: payload

post.description: Processes Stripe webhook events for payment and checkout session updates.

parameters.description: Stripe Signature Header
parameters.name: Stripe-Signature

400.description: Bad Request - invalid input or unhandled event type

500.description: Internal Server Error - failed to process event

get.description:
Retrieves the profile of the user associated with the access token.
Access token must be provided as an `HttpOnly` cookie named `jwt`.

parameters.description: Username of the user to retrieve profile for
parameters.name: username

put.description: Allows an authenticated user to change their password.

parameters.description: Password update payload
parameters.name: payload

parameters.description: Username of the user to change password for
parameters.name: username

500.description: Internal Server Error - failed to change password

put.description: Allows an authenticated user to update their profile details such as username, email, full name, and location.

parameters.description: Profile update payload
parameters.name: payload

parameters.description: Username of the user to update profile for
parameters.name: username

500.description: Internal Server Error - failed to update profile

BearerAuth.description: Use a valid JWT token. Format: Bearer <token>
BearerAuth.name: Authorization

jwtCookieAuth.description: JWT (JSON Web Token) access token, sent as an HttpOnly cookie.
jwtCookieAuth.name: jwt

refreshTokenCookie.description: Refresh token, sent as an HttpOnly cookie.
refreshTokenCookie.name: refresh_token
